Text: The PS3 Team has really good taste. Some of the more obscure films you guys upload are just my cup of tea. Thanks so much!

Hi Can I request a movie?

Since you've uploaded a lot of animated movies. 

Can you please upload Monsters, Inc?

I'd highly appreciate it.

Thanks

Excellent quality, thanks! :D

Btw: I watch 720p & 1080p via MPC - Home Cinema. Such a great experience I've got with this media player! :D
